about.ans: I am Devesh a senior, majoring in Computer Science from NIT, Jalandhar.
I am passionate about programming. A Fullstack developer inclined towards backend. You may have guessed it from my website's public key behind.
I am proficient in Javascript, Typescript, Python & Java ( Learning) and related technologies like Node.js, React, Fast API, GraphQL , AWS, etc.

about.ques: What do I do in my free time?
about.ans: I love watching Anime (200+), playing basketball & contributing to Open Source in my free time.
Learning new things everyday and keep learning and utilize it to solve problems and leave an impact.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
about: Implemented OIDC Auth Server, using Java, Node.js, Express, and Keycloak for enhanced security and scalability.
Transitioned from monolith to microservices, resulting in 30% faster response times.
reducing authentication latency by 20% using CDN caching and pre token generation.
Enhanced user authentication and authorization, achieving reduction in security incidents.

work.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
about: Developed responsive web interfaces with React, improving page load time by 25% and user engagement by 30%.
Integrated Firebase for real-time data synchronization, reducing API response times by 40%.
Collaborated with a cross-functional team to deliver three client projects ahead of schedule.
Conducted code reviews, optimizing codebase for maintainability and achieving a 15% reduction in bugs.
